name: An update for my projector dropped with much-improved “enhanced blacks” and better handling of 24fps content (most movies). I also installed an HDFury VRROOM to enable the projector to handle LLDV Dolby Vision content with Dynamic Tone Mapping. Looks bonkers good!

content.html: An update for my projector dropped with much-improved “enhanced blacks” and better handling of 24fps content (most movies). I also installed an HDFury VRROOM to enable the projector to handle LLDV Dolby Vision content with Dynamic Tone Mapping. Looks bonkers good!
